price: Woe to me! Would that I had not taken so-and-so[13] as a close friend!
arabic: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا
footnotes: [13] i.e., the one who misguided him.
